decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

10/BA/01/FP (Existing Floor Plan) (Date Received 25 September 2024); 10/BA/02/FP (Proposed Porch Extension with Steps)(Date Received 25 September 2024); 10/BA/03/FP (Existing and Proposed Elevations)(Date Received 25 September 2024); 10/BA/04/FP (Existing and Proposed Elevations)(Date Received 25 September 2024); 10/BA/05/FP (Existing and Proposed Roof Plan)(Date Received 25 September 2024); 10/BA/06/FP (Proposed Porch Extension with Steps)(Date Received 25 September 2024); Location Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Retention of a front porch with front steps
